wikipedia_page.main: Alastair John Lyndhurst Bruce, 5th Baron Aberdare (born 2 May 1947), is a British nobleman, and since 2009 a crossbench hereditary Lord Temporal.

link_mentions.page: List of barons in the peerages of Britain and Ireland

response: * Montreal. The first court was built in 1825. The Montreal Rackets Club (founded in 1889) is the oldest in existence according to Alastair Bruce, 5th Baron Aberdare, whose father won the championship there in 1930. The court was constructed four feet longer and two feet wider to facilitate doubles play. It was resized to regulation 60 by 30 feet in 1909.
